definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
Communist International or Comintern (1919-1943), also known as the Third International 第三國際|第三国际[Di4 san1 Guo2 ji4]

pinyin: Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會

definition: Communist Youth League of China/China Youth League
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會宣傳部

definition: Manifesto of the Communist Party/"Manifest der Kommunistischen Partei" by Marx and Engels (1848)

pinyin: guo2 ji4 gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 yun4 dong4

sentences.english: What is Stolypin's attitude toward the mir ?
sentences.chinese: 斯托雷平對農村共產組織的看法是什麼？

sentences.english: The first proposing Chen Duxiu goes to Moscow was Far East Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際代表主張陳獨秀赴莫斯科目的是懲罰他。

sentences.english: People lost faith in the social system and then communism came in.
sentences.chinese: 人們對社會的制度失卻了信心，共產制度於是來臨。
這個反共產主義戰士問道。

sentences.english: Finally, commie china government puts it in the public paper.
sentences.chinese: 最終，共產中國政府把它寫進官方文件裏了。

sentences.english: It just seems like communist China has become synonymous to the LAND OF FAKERS.
sentences.chinese: 似乎共產中國變成了“造假者樂園”的同義詞。

sentences.english: The guidance of Comintern drove the historical course of Chinese revolution.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際的指導推動了中國革命的歷史進程。

sentences.english: Comintern and Chinese revolution are having very close relationship undoubtedly.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際和中國革命無疑有着十分密切的關係。

sentences.english: The SCEZ has no administrative organizations, enterprises or institutions, but has only associations.
sentences.chinese: 共產特區沒有行政和企事業單位，只有協會組織。

sentences.english: The Comintern plaid a rule of "midwife and guardian" in this process.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際在這一過程中扮演了助產士和監護人的角色。

sentences.english: This is the great significance of constructing the Communist economic system.
sentences.chinese: 這是建設共產經濟體系的偉大意義。

sentences.english: Until World War II, Soviet Russia was the only example of a Communist regime.
sentences.chinese: 直到二戰爲止，蘇俄是唯一存在的共產政權的實例。

sentences.english: In a short period of time he grew into a great communist fighter.
sentences.chinese: 在很短時期中，他成長爲一名偉大的共產產義戰士。

sentences.english: Different from ordinary societies, the Dao root of communism has the constant Dao property of perfect fusion.
sentences.chinese: 共產道根具有常道的圓融性質，與一般社會不同。

sentences.english: And the functionaries of the Comintern lost no time in realigning themselves.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際的官員們不失時機地重組自身。

sentences.english: Old age is also full of life pleasure in the communist world.
sentences.chinese: 共產世界的老年人同樣充滿天年的生活樂趣。

definition: united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线[tong3 yi1 zhan4 xian4])
agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
